title: Some words of advice that would be beneficial for this duniya & hereafter? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: actually i'm a medical student studying medicine so this year i am graduating in shelter insurance so i have a few advices that would benefit me in the hereafter and in this world as well in a q a it's difficult you know that it's not a place for lecturing fear allah azzawajal lower your gaze don't free mix with opposite gender always try to excel in your work and do it for the sake of allah and try to give and leave a good impression about muslims and try to be the best in whatever you do
